title: Interpretation of a dream about traveling by train: Seeing riding a train in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about driving a train for a single woman. Interpretation of driving a train in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about driving a train for a married woman. Seeing a train in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a train with someone. Interpretation of a dream about riding and getting off a train. Interpretation of a dream about driving a train for a girl. Interpretation of a dream about a train with someone I know. The train is considered a means of travel and transportation in most countries of the world. Because of its speed and ease of transportation, the large number it carries, and its ease of use between cities, which made it the most widely used means of transportation for him. Cities that use it A person may want to travel by fast or slow train, whether he has seen it before, or ridden it, or any other form of steam or electric train, whether to transport people, or to transport goods, or a small train. It all depends on its speed and the number of vehicles. Or events within it. Trips often indicate good and good news in general, and train travel falls within these designations of travel if nothing bad happens in the events of the trip with it. For something in the world he will take it, and if he wants to get married and accept it, then things will be easy and successful, thanks to God, and if he is a merchant, he will rest in a short time, attached to the speed of the train. Or to spend his business in a short period and his profit. As for the pregnant woman, traveling by train without any accidents or traffic accidents indicates that her pregnancy will be fine, her baby will come healthy and safe, and she will be happy with herself, her husband, or the issue of her life and with her. Children. For an unmarried girl, traveling by express train is moving to a new life, which may be for someone who is about to get married or has reached his age, as he is a man who proposes to her and brings her happiness and kindness. . As for a young woman, it indicates her transition to an educational or practical stage or to a new atmosphere of life. The widow and the divorced woman are either good news. By entering into a new marriage or improving the situation after a while, if the train is fast, and vice versa. As for the unmarried young man, it is an intimate marriage if he desires or accepts it and it is appropriate for his age. As for the young student, it is his improvement in his educational field and his promotion to a new scientific stage. The non-disciple will have a better life and greater happiness in the next stage. For a man, marriage can mean that he will find happiness in his next life and turn it into a better field and a matter of worry. As for a person who travels by train to an unknown destination, it indicates security and prosperity for him and his family or their increase Because of the imminent pregnancy with a new baby for a woman or the wife of the man he is seeing or for him. The beloved wife or poverty and illness, and it is said that the speed of train travel, if the dreamer sees it, indicates that he has reached his goal with that speed. Interpretation of a train in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cow or cow in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a cow or cow in a dream. It is worth noting that a cow is considered a domestic animal, which is also mentioned in the Holy Qur’an, which is considered very useful for people in this life. The course of seeing it in a dream is considered one of the most praiseworthy visions in most cases. . Many people would like to know their interpretations and meanings, and in this context we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about seeing a cow or a cow in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cow or a cow in a dreamIt is worth noting that the scholar Ibn Sirin is considered the famous scholar for clarifying those meanings that carry the dreams that we see in a dream, including seeing a cow. In this context, we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of seeing a cow or cow in a dream. It is also: According to what Ibn Sirin said: Seeing a fat cow in a dream. This dream is evidence of the abundance of goodness and livelihood. Moreover, it is a sign of the arrival of a fruitful year full of blessings and prosperity. Then If he sees a weak cow. This indicates a dry year, in which there are fewer good deeds and a lot of hunger. It should be noted that a cow in general is a symbol of years, days, and months. Also, seeing a cow in a dream is a sign of piety, piety, and righteous people. It is also good news. That the dreamer will fulfill many wishes and hopes. Also, if one sees a cow in a dream. This is evidence of the prosperity of business and the expansion of the scope of its projects, and it is evidence of the profitability of halal, increased profits and improved situation. See also: Meanings of dream interpretation of seeing noose in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream A black and white cow: Seeing animals in a dream is considered one of the usual visions, but its explanations and interpretations differ depending on the type of animal, in addition to it depending on its color. In this context, we explain to you the interpretation of a dream about a black and white cow. It is also: According to what was interpreted by the scholar Ibn Sirin: Whoever saw that he tied the black cow. Next to his house. This vision is evidence of the arrival of abundant goodness to the dreamer. Likewise, seeing a black cow in a dream, whether it is a man or a woman. This is evidence that he earns a lot of money and shows the honor and high status that he will achieve. But if an unmarried man sees a black cow in a dream She is fat, so this dream is evidence of his marriage to a righteous woman who enjoys piety and chastity. In addition, if one sees a black cow in a dream, she will also have horns for you. It is considered an unpleasant vision, as it indicates that the woman he marries will be disobedient and will not comfort him. In dealing, as there will be many differences between them. See also: Meanings of dream interpretation to see in detail Shaking hands with a ruler or king in a dream Attacking cows in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees a cow attacking, it is considered one of the terrifying visions, which often carry those bad interpretations and explanations, In this context, cows attacking a married woman in a dream is also: If a married woman dreams that her cow is attacking her, this is evidence that he has no options. He is also suffering from an evil spirit.

title: Interpretations of seeing the sun in a dream by Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Dreaming of standing in the sunThe sun usually carries interpretations that indicate warmth, energy, vitality, and abundant wealth, but if the sleeper sees that he is standing under the sun, then the sun here indicates that the sleeper is one of the very lucky people, and they will even enjoy the abundance of sustenance and loyal friends. Interpretation of the sun in a dream according to Nabulsiman He sees the sun turning yellow, and the sleeper is often exposed to illness. As for the one who sees the sun shining from him and it is burning to the point that the sun burns the stars around him, the sun here indicates that the king, ruler, or president will expel his environment or his government. As for the one who sees it, flee from the sun, escape here It indicates that the sleeper is running away from his wife, and God knows best. As for whoever sees that the sun is shining directly on his head without a barrier, unfortunately the interpretation of the dream is that something big and great has happened to the sleeper, and God knows best. As for whoever sees the sun in his house, the sun here indicates that the sleeper will gain a lot. Of honor and dignity. Whoever sees in his dreams the sun rising from the west and not from the east, unfortunately, there is an indication of the emergence of hidden things, whether at the level of the sleeper or at the level of society. Interpretation of seeing the sun in red: Whoever sees the sun in red in his dream, this color unfortunately indicates that the sleeper will face a conflict. If the sleeper sees the sun in a completely unfair way, The dream shows that the sleeper cannot distinguish between right and wrong. And if the sleeper sees the sun and the moon together or communicating together, the dream will be interpreted as meaning that the sleeper has a mother and father who are completely satisfied with us. And if the sleeper sees that the sun completely disappears behind the clouds, then the dream here means that the sleeper He will exert a lot of effort in the coming period. As for the one who sees nothing in his sleep except the rays of the sun, the rays here indicate that the sleeper is involved in conflicts and severe quarrels. The sun in a dream is a good thing in general, as it indicates goodness, wealth, power, and food, but in Some places may not bring that much goodness.

title: Interpretation of the light yellow color in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: And the bright yellow clothes that the dreamer is wearing, this indicates that he has reached the highest positions in his field of work. Interpretation of the light yellow color in a dream for a single woman, interpretation of the yellow blouse in a dream, interpretation of the color of lemon in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the light yellow color in a dream for a single girlIf the girl sees An unmarried woman who dreams that she is wearing a large hijab of a very bright yellow color. This indicates that this single girl will achieve some goals and desires that she has always dreamed of in her life. An unmarried girl who sees in a dream that someone is giving her a very light yellow dress. This indicates This single girl is working in a specific job or job and will rise in it and will reach higher ranks very soon. The unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is eating and all the food is light yellow. This indicates that this dreaming single girl will succeed in something very important in her life, and she was Very afraid of him, and God knows best. The interpretation also differs when an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is wearing light yellow shoes, but her appearance was very beautiful. This indicates that she will soon marry a righteous man and he will protect her, and God knows best. You may be interested in: Interpretation of seeing colors. In a dream - the meanings of all colors. Interpretation of seeing light yellow in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that her husband gives her a very light yellow veil. This indicates the calmness of her married life and that she is trying to live her life happily free of problems, worries and annoyances. And if the married woman who dreams sees They make some foods that have a light yellow color, but their appearance is very delicious. This indicates the goodness and satisfaction that will come to this dreaming married woman soon in her life. If the married woman who is dreaming sees in a dream that she bought a light yellow dress and it was beautiful for her. This indicates that she will succeed in some important matters in her life and that she will overcome some annoying problems and worries in her life. The interpretation is completely different when a married woman dreams of buying beautifully designed sandals that were bright yellow and very beautiful. This indicates that she will buy a house or property that she owns in the near future. And you will be very happy with it. Read also: The green color in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing the light yellow color in a dream about a man and its meaning. If one sees in a dream that he is buying a bright yellow and very tight shirt. This indicates that this dreamer will face some problems with him in his field of work, but he will get rid of Very soon. If a man sees in a dream that he is buying large-sized shoes that are a very bright yellow color. This indicates that this dreamer will be blessed with an abundance of goodness, blessings, and money in the coming period, God willing. The interpretation also differs when the dreamer sees in a dream that he is buying a bright yellow suit. It was very suitable for him. This indicates that this dreamer will rise to the highest positions in his work and reach the top in the country

title: Interpretation of a dream about a husband divorcing his wife

preview.html: Whoever sees in a dream that he has divorced his wife twice, here it appears that he is quarreling with one of his family members, and seeing divorce three times in a dream indicates his separation and distance from many people. Interpretation of seeing a husband divorcing his wife in a dream about a single girl. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she She got married and her husband divorced her in a dream. She was very sad in the dream and did not calm down. The meaning indicates that the dreamer will face serious health problems in her life during this period and they will affect her greatly. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she saw a husband divorcing his wife in a dream in front of her. This was the first She shot them and was trying to calm things down between them. This indicates that the dreamer will face major problems in his life. They will continue with them for a long time, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Likewise, seeing an unmarried girl in a dream is facing a quarrel between a couple. Her husband used to swear at her in the dream, and she This is the third shot. It appears here that she will quarrel with someone she loves. And that during this period of her life she will face many problems in her field of work, and God is All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about divorcing my sister. Interpretation of seeing a husband divorcing his wife in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that her husband has divorced her In a dream, the third divorce. And she was trying hard with him to get him back in the dream. It states that this married woman will live in trouble with her husband during this period. It is possible that you will end up in divorce, and God knows best. And if the married woman sees that she is living in a quarrel between A couple very close to her, and the husband divorced his wife with a second divorce. It is interpreted that this man who saw in the dream will leave his job. He will face many problems during this time, and God knows best. Likewise, a married woman who dreams that she dreams that she saw the husband’s divorce from his wife in the dream. It was Very worried and tried to reconcile them. The meaning here is that this dreamer will try hard to keep any dispute away from her, her husband, and their lives during this period. Interpretation of seeing a husband divorcing his wife in a dream about a divorced woman. If a divorced woman dreams that her ex-husband was divorcing her in the dream, then a second divorce It was also hers in the dream. Here, it shows that she is thinking about returning to her husband again during this time and that she is trying hard to do so. And seeing a divorced woman in a dream means that she is living in a big problem between a couple. The husband divorced his wife with the first shot in the dream. The interpretation explains Here, the dreamer will face a major health problem in his life. Or a serious health problem that will greatly affect him, and God is Most High. Likewise, seeing a divorced woman in a dream reconciles between her husband and his wife after he vowed to divorce her in the dream. The interpretation explains that this divorced woman is trying in various ways to get rid of all the problems that she faces. She is going through it at this moment in her life. Read also: Interpretation of dreams of my ex-wife in my family home. Interpretation of seeing a man divorcing his wife in a dream about the man and its meaning. If the dreamer saw in a dream that he was divorcing his wife in a dream. He was happy to get rid of her and return her home. Here it explains that the dreamer Going through some unpleasant periods in

title: What is the interpretation and meaning of seeing a lawyer in a dream?

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a lawyer in a dream is complete from the books of major scholars and the interpretation of dreams and visions and everything related to seeing a lawyer in a complete dream for a married woman, pregnant woman, or man. What is the interpretation of seeing a lawyer via the Haduta website and in this article. Why does a lawyer dream in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin talks about the complete interpretation of seeing a lawyer in a dream, pointing to the problems that the dreamer may see in the afterlife. Seeing a lawyer’s cloak in a dream is complete and wearing it in The dreamer's courtroom is evidence of that favorable moment from which the dreamer will emerge from his troubles and trials. Scholars and interpreters also believe that a full conversation with a lawyer in a dream indicates getting rid of worries and problems, and God knows best. Lawyer in a dream They say that seeing a lawyer in an unmarried girl's dream is evidence of... A lot of gossip and a lot of deceptive conversations about her, and God knows best. Seeing a girl in a complete dream while she is talking to a lawyer says that he will get rid of the problems he suffers from and achieve the goal that she is looking for, and God knows best. To dream of a lawyer for a married woman. They say that when a married woman sees herself in a dream Complete and calls a lawyer, this indicates that she is buying a new property or a house for herself. Likewise, when a married woman sees a lawyer entering her house, this vision indicates that the woman should change her life for the better and get off the street. To see a woman apologizing to a lawyer in court is a testimony On her loyalty to her husband, her work, and her home, and God knows best. Why does a pregnant woman dream? Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream with a lawyer who can plead with her in court is a sign of good luck that the dreamer may find in his life. This vision does not show that the lawyer is pregnant in the courtroom and in Not only the trial, but it also indicates the problems that the dreamer will face and the difficulties of her birth. Why does a lawyer dream of a man? A man sees in a dream a lawyer full of anger – a sign of his imminent illness, God forbid. Also, seeing a lawyer in a man’s dream only indicates that he will get rid of enemies. In the same way The way the dreamer dreams of a lawyer in court may indicate the spread of rumors that may cause him trouble and trouble, and God knows best. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comments below and our team will respond to you.

Lawyer in a dream They say that seeing a lawyer in an unmarried girl's dream is evidence of... A lot of gossip and a lot of deceptive conversations about her, and God knows best. Seeing a girl in a complete dream while she is talking to a lawyer says that he will get rid of the problems he suffers from and achieve the goal that she is looking for, and God knows best. To dream of a lawyer for a married woman. They say that when a married woman sees herself in a dream Complete and calls a lawyer, this indicates that she is buying a new property or a house for herself. Likewise, when a married woman sees a lawyer entering her house, this vision indicates that the woman should change her life for the better and get off the street. To see a woman apologizing to a lawyer in court is a testimony On her loyalty to her husband, her work, and her home, and God knows best. Why does a pregnant woman dream? Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream with a lawyer who can plead with her in court is a sign of good luck that the dreamer may find in his life. This vision does not show that the lawyer is pregnant in the courtroom and in Not only the trial, but it also indicates the problems that the dreamer will face and the difficulties of her birth. Why does a lawyer dream of a man? A man sees in a dream a lawyer full of anger – a sign of his imminent illness, God forbid. Also, seeing a lawyer in a man’s dream only indicates that he will get rid of enemies. In the same way The way the dreamer dreams of a lawyer in court may indicate the spread of rumors that may cause him trouble and trouble, and God knows best. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comments below and our team will respond to you.

title: Interpretation of seeing begging in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing begging in a dream. It is one of the dreams that has many meanings and interpretations. The praiseworthy thing that most scholars and interpreters of dreams, such as Ibn Sirin, see is that this indicates avoiding sins and disobedience and getting closer to God Almighty. We will try to identify some of the meanings of seeing supplication in a dream. About unmarried and married men and women and pregnant women, with the need to emphasize that what we will provide during our website is general information only, and it is important not to conclude this about any other vision that the dreamer saw in a dream. If there is agreement between the two visions, because interpreting the vision requires a skilled scholar with legal knowledge. In addition to dreaming about praying by shouting, this may be an indication of many problems that he is suffering from The dreamer would like to get rid of them. As for praying for patience in the dream, this may be an indication of the good news that the Savior will receive. Seeing prayer in a dream for a man. A man who sees prayer in a dream indicates that this man desires to have a son, and God knows best. In addition, the man in a dream is standing in the rain and screaming, so these are signs Closeness to God - the Almighty - also indicates that this man is good, and God knows best. Just like the god who sees in a dream a prayer for the dead, this indicates that it may be Very soon and he must turn to God - God willing. Just like praying for the dead person

title: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin, letter T

preview.html: Through a website about dreams, see the interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin, letter T. Watch the interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin according to the Arabic alphabet, interpretation of dreams, letter T. Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin, letter, interpretation of dreams, letter Ranaash: The coffin in a dream is a sign of assuming kingship, Whoever sees himself in the coffin indicates that he will assume power, and whoever was given the coffin indicates sustenance and knowledge. In some visions, seeing the coffin indicates fears and problems and may indicate travel. Crown: A crown in a dream is a sign of knowledge and may indicate kingship and may indicate The Qur’an. Merchant: Seeing a merchant in a dream means an increase in trade and may indicate profits, gains and perhaps travel. Yawning: Yawning in a dream does not deserve praise and may be a sign of immorality and may be actions that please Satan and may be a sign of illness. Image in a dream Hot: Interpretation of a dream Ibn Sirin, the letter ta is from lupine, and seeing a green lupine in a dream means miserliness or slavery that comes with hardship and fatigue. Perhaps it indicates knowledge without work, and seeing a dry lupine is a sign of anxiety, and seeing a boiled lupine is a good and nutritious thing. Al-Wadiah: And the tashahhud in a dream In prayer, it is evidence of ease and comfort, and the tashahhud indicates the condition. Interpretation of dreams: The letter Ritfaha: Seeing apples in a dream means children or a person with a good face. Takbir: Seeing takbir in a dream indicates continuous repentance, and saying that God is great in a dream means victory over others. Enemies and showing joy, and it was said that it is an honor. Passing: Seeing eating dates in a dream means sustenance or the viewer benefiting from the Qur’an and seeing buried dates is a sign of saving money. Loose teeth in a dream Crocodile: Seeing a crocodile in a dream indicates the presence of a policeman or it may indicate an unjust merchant. Fair, and the crocodile may indicate fear or anxiety. Repentance: Repentance in a dream indicates the dreamer’s escape from prison and may indicate ownership, honor, and perhaps a blessing. Zakhr: Tayammum in a dream indicates the approaching Gulf, and tayammum can indicate travel and can be a harbinger of illness. It can indicate the cessation of water. Figs: Figs in a dream indicate money and figs are rich, and eating figs is evidence of a large number of offspring and offspring, and it is said that eating figs brings the pioneer without fatigue. Seeing twins in a dream Threatening: And from the opinion of the one who threatens him, this indicates the victory of the person who It threatens him and indicates his safety. Dragon: Seeing a dragon in a dream is a sign of an unjust ruler who fears people, and seeing a dragon for a sick person is a sign in the near term. Seeing a transformation into a dragon indicates longevity and gaining strength, and a dragon can symbolize a long time. Hill: A hill in The dream shows a dangerous person. Shortcomings: Seeing shortcomings may indicate shortcomings in work or may indicate that the viewer is limited in permissions, and may indicate a shortening of shaving the head, and God knows best. Raspberries: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin, the letter T. Raspberries in a dream, eating them indicates A large profit benefits its owner, and black berries in a dream indicate a dinar, and white berries indicate a dollar

title: Interpretation of seeing a slaughtered sheep in a dream by Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribed Fans Interpretation of seeing a slaughtered sheep in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. It indicates repentance from sins, and in this article we will give you all possible interpretations of seeing a lamb in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream in a dream about a sheep. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a sheep in a dream as a reference to a righteous son for his mother and father. And whoever sees in a dream that someone gave her a sheep in a dream And his wife is pregnant in reality. This dream warns him that God will bless him with a good son and mother. We see a lamb in a dream that shows strength, youth, and the life he lives, which is dominated by dating, making new friends, and love. Whoever sees in a dream that he is slaughtering a sheep, this dream indicates the death of someone close to him and whom he loves, He could be a friend or a relative of his. Interpretation of seeing a sheep: An unmarried woman sees a sheep in a dream, and this may indicate a person who proposes to her in marriage, but the groom may be weak and unable to make decisions without consulting her, which means that he is “a person who has no will.” But he is financially capable. Whoever sees a small, white sheep in a dream, this indicates that his brother-in-law is weak in character and can control him. If you see a black sheep in a dream, this indicates entering into a fleeting romantic relationship, and the dream can be a sign of youth, beauty, and elegance. There are those who interpreted seeing a brown sheep in a dream, in relation to first love. Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a married woman’s dream: A pregnant woman who sees her husband giving her a white sheep in a dream, this may be a sign of imminent pregnancy. As for someone who sees a deceased person being presented to him in a dream with a sheep. White, this is a sign of permanent charity towards the dead. As for whoever hunts a sheep and feeds it in a dream, this indicates a covenant with the one that has not been fulfilled. As for whoever sees his father or brother offering him a sheep, this indicates his livelihood. Interpretation of seeing a lamb in a dream Seeing a lamb in a dream means The newborn in a dream is a male, and God knows best, and seeing a lot of sheep indicates the number of months remaining for the pregnant woman. Seeing a black sheep in a dream means sustenance and money. Interpretation of seeing a small sheep in a dream: Seeing a small sheep in a dream indicates a kind, obedient, and fair boy with his parents. And the small one indicates To the virgin and in general, seeing young sheep indicates blessing and goodness in the life of the dreamer, and indicates the fulfillment of desires. Therefore, we present to you all possible interpretations of seeing a sheep in a dream. For anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article and we will provide you with the explanation in As soon as possible.

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a farm in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A farm in a dream. There is no doubt that the green color has a very happy connotation. Everyone wants to see plants and green spaces, so if the dreamer sees a farm in his dream, it means goodness and grace, especially if the farm is actually of a beautiful shape. Thus, we learn about the meaning of the dream through the interpretations of the majority of scholars. The farm in a dream - which - Interpretation of the dream about the farm has very happy meanings, as there is a lot of food, an abundance of money and a way out of all material and psychological pressures. If the dreamer is suffering from a bad psychological state and sees this dream, He will recover from his condition in a short period of time. Timeline. The vision expresses a financial increase and an increase in health and children, so the dreamer must always thank his Lord for these many blessings that everyone desires, and he will also find that the goodness increases and never decreases in the coming days. Projects that increase his profits a lot. If the dreamer is looking for a job opportunity that matches his ambitions, then this dream welcomes him to reach the job he desires without any control from others, and he will prove his worth until he reaches the highest rank and has great interest in society. We find that a beautiful farm is evidence of a happy life, but if the farm has a problem or is devoid of plants, then the dreamer must look at his life and correct his mistakes until his Lord is satisfied with him and gets what he wants without him. Falling into mistakes or sins, then finding goodness from God Almighty at all times. The farm in a dream by Ibn Sirin Our respected sheikh Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a farm indicates success in all areas of life, such as education, personal life, work, and health, from all parents and relatives. The dream indicates success in all areas of life, such as education, personal life, work, and health. Until there are positive changes in the dreamer's life that put him in a better and higher position than he is, so he lives his life in comfort and stability without facing problems or falling into distress or evil. Not only that, but he will make new friends that will make his life happier than before. The vision indicates that Freedom from worries and problems, the ability to overcome adversity with ease, and the ability to live happily and stably in the coming period, where success will come from the Lord of the Worlds and you will live on a wonderful financial level. The farm in a dream for a single woman. The vision is promising for her because it indicates her close marriage to the right person who will make Her heart is happy and makes her live her life the way she dreams and she will achieve her goals with her partner and be stable and understood. Family. The dream indicates the fulfillment of all her dreams. If she wants to travel to study, she will travel soon and fulfill her life’s dream. If she wants to start a family with the person she loves, she will fulfill this desire and life will be stable and peaceful with her family. The farm in a dream for a married woman. The vision expresses a calm and stable relationship with the husband, where there is understanding and not falling into crises. If He faces any problem, he handles it smoothly and easily and can go through it with complete success. The vision shows that she lives in a very wonderful material level with luxury and a distinguished status until she...
